pages.text: In order to teleport somewhere, you first have to go to the place you want, then mark it with a teleporter control device. The teleporter controller can be replaced with TechReborn's Frequency Transmitter if TechReborn is installed.

To power the teleporter, you'll need to attach a source of energy to the teleporter. Since this mod is based on Team Reborn's core library, TechReborn generators can power the teleporter in addition to this mod's generators. After that, put the teleporter control in the teleporter and crouch on top of the teleporter to teleport.
The teleporter should look like this when it's ready to be used.
